title: Ah Mudhal Akku Song Lyrics Jithan
stanzas:
Ah muthal akku thaanada
en akka ponnu kikku thaanada
A muthal Z thaanada
iva ever silver thattu thaanadaa

kottaakuchikulla vaayendi
rendu perum  koottan choru
aakki thunnalaam.

ettaa number pola dhegathai
naanum ippa onnaa number
aakka poren da..

Ah muthal akku thaanada
en akka ponnu kikku thaanada
A muthal Z thaanada
iva ever silver thattu thaanadaa

Vazha maramaa irukkuraale
valavalappa sarukkuraale
kandhu vattiyaa perukkuraale
kannu urutti morakkuraale (2)

Mangaa thamizh neekenna
madhaavaram paal panna
mondu mondu thaan thinna
munne vaayendi

otharuvaa pottu kaari
othulaikka gettik kaari
thala thalanu kulungi varum
thaagam theerkum
thanni lorry

pinnazhagu poonthottam
munnazhagu maanthottam
thooram ninu
paadhu kaakkum thotta
kaaran naan.

thaneer panjathil
naan unna paathuputta
kudhikkum nenjellaam
kuththaalam thaan.

veedu soththellaam
un peril ezhudhi thaaren
kooda nee irundha
kummaalamthaan.

Ah muthal akku thaanada
en akka ponnu kikku thaanada
A muthal Z thaanada
iva ever silver thattu thaanadaa

kottaakuchikulla vaayendi
rendu perum  koottan choru
aakki thunnalaam.

ettaa number pola dhegathai
naanum ippa onnaa number
aakka poren da.

seo.title: Ah Mudhal Akku Song Lyrics Jithan
seo.description: Get the complete Ah Mudhal Akku Song Lyrics Jithan from Jithan. composed by Srikanth Deva and sung by Shankar Mahadevan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Jithan, Srikanth Deva, Shankar Mahadevan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
